text: Mad About You is an American situation comedy. It began on NBC on September 23, 1992. It ended on May 24, 1999. It stars Paul Reiser and Helen Hunt. They play a married couple living in New York City. Near the end of the sitcom's run, the couple have a baby, Mabel. == Other websites == * Category:1992 American television series debuts Category:1999 American television series endings Category:1990s romance television series Category:1990s American sitcoms Category:Golden Globe Award winning programs Category:Romantic comedy television series Category:Television series about marriage Category:Television series set in New York City Category:English-language television programs
title: Mad About You
